name: Daggers And Diamonds
description:
WARNING: PLAY WITH CHROMIUM BASED BROWSERS (BRAVE, CHROME, OGX)

MOVE TO THE BEAT OF THE MUSIC! KILL SKELETONS TO INCREASE YOUR SCORE MULTIPLIER! COLLECT AS MANY DIAMONDS AS YOU CAN! AVOID THE ARMY OF DARKNESS AND OUTLAST THE NECRODANCER'S MUSIC! KILL THEM BEFORE THEY KILL YOU!

DAGGERS AND DIAMONDS: HOW TO PLAY

W and S to move forward and back!

Q and E to strafe left and right!

A and D to rotate directions!

P to pause the game!

Kill skeletons by walking into them!

CREDITS

Danny Baranowsky - Crypt of the Necrodancer Tracks

Brace Yourself Games - Crypt of the Necrodancer Tileset and Audio Samples

HAPPY HALLOWEEN! :)

For Clarification: This was a project I worked on in my spare time that I submitted as an assignment for one of my classes a few months ago. It's written in pure vanilla javascript with some helping assistance from p5js for initialization purposes. Have fun!
